name: SmartBlurMode

properties.name: NORMAL
properties.description: Blur is applied to entire image.

properties.name: EDGEONLY
properties.description: Blur is applied only to edges of color transitions.
properties.longdesc: Where significant contrast occurs, applies black-and-white edges.

properties.name: OVERLAYEDGE
properties.description: Blur is applied only to edges of color transitions.
properties.longdesc: Where significant contrast occurs, applies white edges.

description: The method to use for smart blurring.
